G

Game - Class in controller
new game controller class to load and manage a game
Game() - Constructor for class controller.Game
 
GameBoard - Class in controller
to load the game board with its cells and configuration
GameBoard - Class in model
the board the game is played on
GameBoard - Class in view
the view for the board of the game. observes the relevant model class
GameBoard() - Constructor for class controller.GameBoard
 
GameHeader - Class in view
view of the game header, with lives, timer, points etc.
GameScreen - Class in view
view of the entire game screen. includes game header and game board
